name: Bulb Cat
description:
Help a cat with a bulb for a head escape a dark sewer!

Controls:
A/D or arrows - left/right movement
Spacebar - jump
E - shiny attack (has a cooldown)
Esc - back to main menu or quit the game if you reached the end

Gamepad controls:
Left stick - movement
A/X - jump
B/O - attack
Start - back to menu (you'll need to use the mouse for level selection, sorry)

There are issues that i didn't manage to fix in time, but i'm satisfied with the result nonetheless.
If you encounter any game breaking bugs, let me know!
Also if you want to erase the save file, look for "GeloRuse" folder in Appdata\LocalLow (Windows version). 

Made for a Quick Jam #1. Theme: "Light".

All sounds from Freesound.org
